description: Looks like those copypasta stories about Facebook’s rights to your information were right all along.
title: Facebook will use our data for training generative AI models

description:
Sarmale

Sarmale is the Romanian name for stuffed cabbage rolls; similar recipes are popular party food throughout the Balkans and former Ottoman Empire. They are similar to Greek dolmades.
title: Sarmale recipe

description: Without the open-source software community, this website would not exist. Thank you so much for the help!
title: Thank you, Hugo Community!

description: Yesterday, there was a photo exhibition by the Somerset Art Group. It is a group started by colleagues and good friends from Seetec-Pluss, and I was invited to help out and exhibit there. The above photos are a collage of my work that was exhibited, alongside many other, more talented, photographers.
title: Somerset Art Group Photography Exhibition at YEAST Scrap Store
